description: This file defines a class 'CSVKnowledgeBase' that manages CSV data sources, including reading CSV files synchronously and asynchronously, handling file paths with optional metadata, and loading documents into a vector database. It interacts with other components like CSVReader, Document, and logging utilities.

classes.name: CSVKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class that manages CSV data sources, providing methods to read, asynchronously read, and load CSV documents into a knowledge base, with support for file path handling and metadata.

methods.name: document_lists
methods.description: Property that yields lists of Document objects from CSV files, handling multiple paths and metadata.

methods.name: async_document_lists
methods.description: Asynchronous generator property that yields lists of Document objects from CSV files.

methods.name: load_document
methods.description: Loads documents from a specified CSV file into the vector database, with optional metadata and control flags.

methods.name: aload_document
methods.description: Asynchronously loads documents from a specified CSV file into the vector database, with optional metadata and control flags.

methods.name: _is_valid_csv
methods.description: Helper method to check if a given path points to a valid CSV file that is not excluded.
